name: Business Law Center
description: We Offer Business Mediation and Legal Services The Business Law Center offers you solid legal advice and consultation from vetted, insured, reputable attorneys, in all aspects of business law. For start-ups and established businesses, 30-minute legal consultations in areas critical to your business are available for just $35. Areas include, but are not limited to: - Contracts - Copyright - Paten - Trademark - Leasing - Accessibility for persons with disabilities - Asset management - Business imm

howToGetIt: Call us (415) 989-1616 Monday through Friday 9:00 a.m. – 1:00 p.m.; 1:30 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. PST or submit your case online at https://www.sfbar.org/lris/online-referral/
cost: 30-minute consultation with your lawyer is absolutely free. For all other legal issues, you pay $35
agency: The Bar Association of San Francisco
